price: 6. Ee iskaga jeeso (Nabi Muxammadow); (oo dhowr) Maalinka uu baaquhu ugu baaqi wax daran3.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ
footnotes: 3. Waxaa la yidhi waa malag ugu yeedhi dadka xisaab iyo garsoor.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
